author: geirm
msg: Added section describing the separate runtime instances, and two
little code snippets to show how similar they are.  Also added note
on the direct logger access for the avalon logger.

author: geirm
msg: Added idea/patch from Carsten Ziegeler <cziegeler@sundn.de> to allow
user to just specify an existing AvalonLogger by name.
Also, the LogSystem.init() method throws an exception - if it can't get
logging going, it has to do something (since it can't tell you via the
logs...).  Also modified AvalonLogSystem to throw an Exception if it

msg: Move the prefixing of log level into here.

author: geirm
msg: Moved the addition of the 'level' prefix out of here (moved into
